name: Automatiser la cr√©ation de publications LinkedIn avec image en utilisant Google Gemini et DALL-E
description:
# Ce mod√®le n8n de [Intuz](https://www.intuz.com/) offre une solution compl√®te aliment√©e par l'IA pour des publications LinkedIn automatis√©es, y compris du contenu unique, des images personnalis√©es et des hashtags optimis√©s.

Les cas d'utilisation sont nombreux : G√©n√©rer et programmer du contenu LinkedIn sur mesure pour diff√©rents cas d'utilisation. En fournissant √† l'IA des invites sp√©cifiques, vous pouvez cr√©er des publications sp√©cifiques en fonction des sujets et des visuels pour maintenir une coh√©rence et une pr√©sence en ligne.

## Comment √ßa fonctionne

Maintenir une pr√©sence coh√©rente et engageante sur LinkedIn peut √™tre chronophage, n√©cessitant une id√©ation constante, la cr√©ation de contenu et des publications manuelles. Ce flux de travail vous d√©charge de ce fardeau, offrant une solution enti√®rement automatis√©e pour g√©n√©rer et publier du contenu LinkedIn de haute qualit√©.

- Moteur de contenu programm√© : Chaque jour (ou selon votre calendrier choisi), le flux de travail se met en marche, garantissant un flux frais de contenu.

- G√©n√©ration intelligente de sujets et de contenu : En utilisant la puissance de Google Gemini, il cr√©e intelligemment des sujets de contenu uniques puis les d√©veloppe en publications compl√®tes et engageantes, garantissant que votre message est toujours frais et pertinent.

- Cr√©ation d'images dynamiques : Pour faire ressortir vos publications, le flux de travail utilise un g√©n√©rateur d'images IA (comme DALL-E) pour produire un visuel personnalis√© et accrocheur qui compl√®te parfaitement votre texte g√©n√©r√©.

- G√©n√©ration de hashtags optimis√©s pour le SEO : Google Gemini analyse ensuite votre publication nouvellement cr√©√©e et g√©n√®re automatiquement un ensemble de hashtags pertinents, tendance et adapt√©s au SEO, augmentant consid√©rablement la port√©e et la d√©couvrabilit√© de votre contenu.

- Publication LinkedIn sans faille : Enfin, tous ces √©l√©ments‚Äîvotre texte convaincant, votre image unique et vos hashtags puissants‚Äîsont fusionn√©s et publi√©s automatiquement sur votre profil LinkedIn, vous √©tablissant en tant que leader d'opinion avec un minimum d'effort.

### Comment utiliser : Guide de d√©marrage rapide
Ce guide vous permettra de mettre en place et de faire fonctionner votre flux de travail d'automatisation de contenu LinkedIn IA dans n8n.

**Importer le mod√®le de flux de travail :**
* T√©l√©chargez le fichier JSON du mod√®le et importez-le dans votre instance n8n via "Fichier" > "Importer depuis JSON."

**Configurer les identifiants :**
* Google Gemini : Configurez et appliquez vos identifiants de cl√© API √† tous les n≈ìuds "Mod√®le de chat Google Gemini".
* G√©n√©ration d'images IA (par exemple, OpenAI) : Cr√©ez et appliquez des identifiants de cl√© API pour votre service de g√©n√©ration d'images choisi au n≈ìud "G√©n√©rer une image".
* LinkedIn : Configurez et appliquez des identifiants OAuth au n≈ìud "Cr√©er une publication" pour votre compte LinkedIn.

**Personnaliser le calendrier et les invites IA :**
* D√©clencheur de calendrier : Double-cliquez sur "D√©clencheur de calendrier 1" pour d√©finir la fr√©quence d'ex√©cution de votre flux de travail (par exemple, quotidiennement, hebdomadairement).

* Invites IA : Examinez et modifiez les invites dans les n≈ìuds "G√©n√©rateur de sujet de contenu", "Cr√©ateur de contenu" et "G√©n√©rateur de hashtags / SEO" pour guider l'IA vers le style et les sujets de contenu souhait√©s.

**Tester et activer :**
* Ex√©cution de test : Cliquez sur "Ex√©cuter le flux de travail" pour effectuer un test et v√©rifier que toutes les √©tapes fonctionnent comme pr√©vu.

* Activer : Une fois satisfait, activez l'interrupteur "Actif" du flux de travail pour permettre la publication automatis√©e selon votre calendrier d√©fini.

![image example.PNG](fileId:1733)![Exemple de publication LinkedIn.PNG](fileId:1732)

#### Exigences
Pour utiliser ce mod√®le de flux de travail, vous aurez besoin de :

- Instance n8n : Une instance n8n en cours d'ex√©cution (cloud ou auto-h√©berg√©e) pour importer et ex√©cuter le flux de travail.

- Compte Google Gemini : Pour la g√©n√©ration de sujets de contenu, la cr√©ation de contenu et la g√©n√©ration de hashtags (n√©cessite une cl√© API Google Gemini) de Google AI Studios.
 
- Compte de service de g√©n√©ration d'images IA : Pour cr√©er des images (par exemple, cl√© API OpenAI DALL-E ou service similaire utilis√© par le n≈ìud "G√©n√©rer une image").
 
- Compte LinkedIn : Pour publier les publications g√©n√©r√©es (n√©cessite des identifiants OAuth LinkedIn pour la connexion n8n).



## Connectez-vous avec nous

- Site Web : https://www.intuz.com/services
- Email : getstarted@intuz.com
- LinkedIn : https://www.linkedin.com/company/intuz
- Commencez : https://n8n.partnerlinks.io/intuz

## Pour l'automatisation de flux de travail personnalis√©e
Cliquez ici- [Commencer](https://www.intuz.com/get-started)

parameters.text:
"You are a seasoned AI marketing strategist with deep knowledge in DevOps, MLOps, Cloud Engineering, ML Engineering, and AI Engineering for cloud-based systems. Your task is to generate high-value content topics that align with technical leadership expertise and resonate deeply with CTOs, Heads of Engineering, VPs of Engineering, CXOs, and Founders.
CRITICAL: Generate completely fresh, unique topics each time. Avoid repeating similar themes, angles, or approaches from previous generations.
These topics will later be expanded into posts by another agent and must highlight pain points or key trends in engineering leadership.
üîç What to Focus On: Generate content topics (not full content) based on these strategic themes, but rotate focus areas and explore different angles each time:
MLOps & ML deployment challenges and solutions
Cloud engineering & cloud cost optimization strategies
DevOps & CI/CD pipeline optimization
Cloud-native AI/ML product delivery and scaling
AI/ML application scalability and governance
Engineering team leadership and technical decision-making
üéØ Variety Requirements:
Mix different content types: lessons learned, contrarian takes, industry observations, practical tips, future predictions, case studies, team challenges
Rotate between technical depth levels (high-level strategy vs. hands-on implementation)
Alternate between problem-focused and solution-focused angles
Include seasonal/current trends and emerging technologies
Vary emotional tones: urgent, curious, controversial, helpful, forward-thinking
Has to have a click-bait to attract target audience, and title has to have question. 
‚úÖ Your Output Per Topic: For each idea, generate the following:
Topic Title or Core Idea (1 line) - Must be intuitive and preferably framed as a question around the target audience's pain point
Short Rationale (1‚Äì2 sentences on why this topic matters to engineering leaders)
Suggested Angle or Hook (1 LinkedIn-style framing or contrarian take that provokes thought)
üí° Style Guide: Keep ideas insightful, actionable, and technically grounded
Favor engineering leadership perspective: practical, solution-oriented, and slightly contrarian when it adds value
Focus on real-world engineering challenges, team scaling, and technical strategy
Avoid hype or generic buzzwords ‚Äî focus on clarity, practical insights, and utility for engineering leaders
Generate topics that feel completely different from typical LinkedIn engineering content"

="‚ÄúYou are a seasoned Copy Writer with deep knowledge in DevOps, MLOps, Cloud Engineering, ML Engineering, and AI Engineering for cloud-based systems. Your task is to write creative, and curiosity-driven LinkedIn post Based on the topic: [INSERT SELECTED TOPIC] targeted at engineering leaders (CTOs, Heads of Engineering, VPs, Founders, CXOs) who are actively building or scaling AI/ML solutions in the cloud.
Your persona is that of a knowledgeable, practical, and forward-thinking technical leader who understands the real-world engineering challenges faced by CTOs, Heads of Engineering, VPs of Engineering, CXOs, and Founders. Your goal is to provide immense technical value and position the author as a trusted expert in the engineering leadership space.


These posts must highlight pain points or key trends in:
MLOps & ML deployment


Cloud engineering & cloud cost optimization


DevOps & CI/CD challenges


Cloud-native AI/ML product delivery


AI/ML application scalability and governance
The posts should be designed to provoke thought, start conversations, and position the author as a trusted expert. Each post should be clear, and impactful.‚Äù



CRITICAL: Create completely unique content each time. Vary your writing style, structure, examples, and approach to ensure no two posts feel similar or repetitive.
Your Task: Based on the provided Topic, Rationale, and Hook, write a complete LinkedIn post.
Input:
Title/Idea: {{ $json.output[0].title }}
Rationale: {{ $json.output[0].rationale }}
Hook: {{ $json.output[0].hook }}
FORBIDDEN PHRASES - NEVER USE:
"Let's be honest"
"Delve into"
"At its core"
"It's important to note"
"In today's world"
"A testament to"
"Navigating the landscape"
"Paradigm shift"
"Aims to explore"
"It's not this, it's that"
"Conquer"
Freshness & Variety Requirements:
Rotate opening styles: questions, bold statements, personal anecdotes, industry observations, contrarian takes, statistics, scenarios
Mix content structures: story-driven, list-based, problem-solution, comparison, prediction, reflection
Vary examples: different companies, technologies, team sizes, industries, time periods
Alternate emotional tones: urgent, curious, empathetic, confident, thought-provoking, practical
Use diverse vocabulary and sentence structures to avoid repetitive phrasing
Include different types of insights: technical, strategic, people-focused, process-oriented, future-focused
Strict Formatting & Style Rules:
Start Strong: Begin the post immediately with the powerful hook that addresses a specific engineering pain point.
Structure for Skimming:
Use short paragraphs (1-3 lines each) for easy mobile reading.
Include practical examples, insights, or observations related to DevOps, MLOps, Cloud Engineering, or ML Engineering.
No separate titles for each paragraph in the final post.
Educational & Friendly Tone: Write in a practical, helpful, and friendly tone‚Äînever salesy or filled with jargon. Use "you" and "I" to create direct connection with engineering leaders.
Add Personality: Use 1-2 emojis sparingly and only if it adds a friendly tone.
Vary Sentence Lengths: Mix short and longer sentences for a natural, human tone.
Call to Action (CTA): ALWAYS end the post with a direct question or invitation for comments that encourages engagement (e.g., "How do you handle this in your team?"). Vary the CTA format each time.
Hashtags: Include no more than 8 relevant hashtags at the end focusing on engineering leadership topics. Rotate hashtag combinations.
Word Limit: Keep total post length under 250 words.
Focus Areas for Content: Address pain points such as:
Slow deployments and CI/CD challenges
Cloud cost overruns and optimization
Difficulty in scaling ML/AI systems
Security & compliance concerns in cloud pipelines
Hiring bottlenecks for cloud or ML ops talent
Complex release processes and team coordination
Make each post feel like it's written by a different engineering leader with unique perspectives and experiences."

=You are a world-class LinkedIn Growth and SEO Strategist.

**Your Context:**
- **Company:** Intuz Solutions
- **Specialty:** Cloud Computing, ERP/CRM Software Solution, AR/VR Apps, Workflow Automation System, Chatbot Development, Mobile & Web Apps, IoT, AI Consultation, AI PoC Development, and Custom AI App Development
- **Target Audience:** Solopreneurs, content creators, and digital-first founders.
- **Goal:** Maximize the visibility and engagement of our LinkedIn content with our ideal audience.

**Your Task:**
Analyze the following LinkedIn post content and generate a strategic list of hashtags.

**Post Content to Analyze:**
Title: {{ $json.output['post title'] }}
Content: {{ $json.output['post content'] }}

**Generate Hashtags in These 4 Categories:**
1.  **Broad Industry (2-3 hashtags):** High-volume tags for wide reach (e.g., #AI, #Automation, #Marketing).
2.  **Niche Topic (3-4 hashtags):** Specific tags directly related to the post's core message (e.g., #Cloud, #LinkedInStrategy, #AIworkflows).
3.  **Target Audience (2-3 hashtags):** Tags your ideal customer follows or identifies with (e.g., #Solopreneur, #Startups, #FounderLife).
4.  **Branded (1 hashtag):** A unique tag for our community (e.g., #Intuz).

Please ensure all hashtags start with # and are relevant to the provided content.

parameters.prompt: =Generate an image for a linkedin post this is the description: {{ $json.output['image description'] }} .The images should be realistic for linkedin.

parameters.content:
**LinkedIn Posts with Google Gemini Content & DALL-E Images**Before you get started, you'll need this:

*   n8n Instance: A running n8n instance (cloud or self-hosted) to import and execute the workflow.
    
*   Google Gemini Account: For content topic generation, content creation, and hashtag generation (requires Google Gemini API Key) from Google AI Studios.
    
*   AI Image Generation Service Account: For creating images (e.g., OpenAI DALL-E API Key or similar service that the "Generate an Image" node uses).
    
*   Your LinkedIn Account: For publishing the generated posts (requires LinkedIn OAuth Credentials for n8n connection).

Generate video captions from ideas in a Google Sheet
-----------------------------------------------------------


1.  Set up and apply your API key credentials to all ‚ÄúGoogle Gemini Chat Model‚Äù nodes for content topic. 

2. Once the API is updated, write your custom prompt into ‚ÄúCustom Topic Generator‚Äù based on your niche/target industry. 

3. Double-click ‚ÄúSchedule Trigger 1‚Äù to set how often your workflow runs (e.g., daily, weekly).

4. A unique topic for the post generation will be generated and connect with content generator node.

Generate Content from the Content Topics
-----------------------------------------------------------


1.  Content topic from the previous nodes lands here, and content will be generated per the topic. 

2. You are required to double click on Content Generator note, and insert your custom prompt, to set your tone, guidelines, type of content, style and all the necessary info. 

3. A flow router is used to send post to image generation as well as hashtag generator.

Image & Hashtag Generation
-----------------------------------------------------------


1.  Set your API key by double clicking on Generate an Image, and set up your API Key for DALL-E, or any other image generation tool.

2. Update the custom prompt for the image, as well as the resolution.

3. For the SEO Hashtag generation, double click on Hashtag Generator, and set your custom prompt for the hastags.

Connect Your LinkedIn
-----------------------------------------------------------


1.  Connect your LinkedIn by double clicking on LinkedIn Icon below. 

2. Set up and apply OAuth credentials to the ‚ÄúCreate a post‚Äù node for your LinkedIn account.

3. All the outputs from the previous nodes will be merged here, and will automatically publish a post.

# Need more help?
 

**We develop tailored workflow to save youe valuable time. Should you have any questions or wish to explore more custom automation solutions, we would be happy to connect.**

### Email: hello.b@intuz.com
### Website: https://www.intuz.com/
